message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
Let's be real, Alice. I'll be generous and take the same amount you offered me last round.
You didn't take my first offer, now it's a bit less for you
This is getting ridiculous, Alice. Let's just split it evenly and call it a day.
You should have taken one of my previous offers, now it's even less for you
Okay, Alice, you win. I'll take your original offer.  Any more rounds and it'll be worthless!
